Html:
With Prism v4, do we have a defined strategy for a WPF application that needs (UI labels only) localization enabled ? If not, kindly let know the recommended approach for enabling localization when Prism v4 is in use. (currently with drop 10).

 

thanks,

Nitin
Localization of a Prism app for WPF is just like localizing a WPF app.  Check out http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms788718.aspx as a starting point.
